text:
@fred_guttenberg @senatemajldr Missourians: Fuck #COVID19  and fuck #Hydroxycloroquine !  We got meth and Budweiser and a baptist church on every corner!  We all gonna be just fine.

(Disclaimer: I'm a Missourian, and I'm both ashamed and frightened.)
